message.content:
cs.AI, cs.MA, cs.RO, cs.SY, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with decentralized multiagent decision-making problems, which are typically studied in the sub-fields of artificial intelligence (cs.AI), multiagent systems (cs.MA), and robotics (cs.RO). The use of Dec-POMDPs, a well-known model in the field of decision-making under uncertainty, further supports the likelihood of cs.AI and cs.RO as potential sub-categories. The paper also proposes a heuristic algorithm for solving information gathering Dec-POMDPs, which falls under the category of machine learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper's focus on optimization and convexity suggests the possibility of the sub-category of control systems (cs.SY).
